tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE commissioned_paintings (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  painting_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  painter_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  deadline DATE,
  client_specifications TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE painting_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_id INT,
    current_status VARCHAR(50),
    completion_date DATE,
    remarks TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (painting_id) REFERENCES commissioned_paintings(painting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE commissioned_paintings (
    id INT,
    painting_name VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    deadline DATE,
    client_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE paintings (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  deadline DATE,
  client_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE artists (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  style VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE progress (
  painting_id INTEGER,
  in_progress BOOLEAN,
  completed_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE commissioned_paintings (
  painting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20),
  deadline DATE,
  client_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE painting_details (
  painting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  canvas_size VARCHAR(20),
  paint_type VARCHAR(20),
  color_palette VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE painting_history (
  painting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  previous_status VARCHAR(20),
  new_status VARCHAR(20),
  date_changed TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE artist_portfolio (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(50),
  style VARCHAR(50),
  years_of_experience INT
)
